name: Lavender rabbit in turquoise and cobalt blue
description: You are viewing an eco friendly handmade rabbit decoration. This rabbit is made from vintage fabric in shades of turquoise, bottle green and cobalt blue. Its ears are filled with chemical-free, French lavender They also have snowy white felt bobtails! You can either place them on your pillow or dressing table to help you float off to sleep Or hang in your wardrobe to make your clothes smell nice, perfect when spring cleaning Did you know? Lavender is a good moth repellent. Lavender makes an eco-friendly alternative to conventional moth balls which are full of hazardous chemicals Measurements 6.5 inches (16.5cm) tall 3.5 inches (9cm) wide ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ this listing is for one turquoise and cobalt blue rabbit This rabbit has a white satin ribbon hanging loop This rabbit is not a toy, it is for decorative purposes only :) ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ****** IMPORTANT INFORMATION FOR AUSTRALIAN CUSTOMERS Please note that due to customs restrictions on dried lavender products, this rabbit cannot be shipped to Australia If you are in Australia and would like one of our rabbits, we are happy to make one with no lavender in. Please contact us to arrange a lavender-free rabbit! ****** All prices are in UK £ sterling For currency conversion, please see this website: http://www.xe.com We are based in the United Kingdom. We ship worldwide Please see our FAQs for terms of sale Thank you for taking the time to visit our shop, any questions, please contact us!

name: SALE! bubblegum pink vintage fabric clothespin bag
description: sale: reduced by from £20 to £14 you are viewing a vintage fabric peg bag designed and handmade by Pouch Made with recycled vintage fabric & a vintage wooden coat hanger It features a floral pattern in shades of bubblegum and cotton candy pink with hints of citrus yellow There’s no better way to dry your washing, than to peg it out and let it dry in the breeze Did you know? The tumble drier is one of the most energy-hungry appliances in the house By reducing the number of times you use a tumble drier by just one load per week, you will reduce your carbon emissions by approximately 60kg a year. And reduce your electricity bill! Measurements: 15 inches high (38cm) (not including metal loop of coat hanger) and 13 inches wide (33cm) All prices are in UK £ sterling For currency conversion, please see this website: http://www.xe.com We are based in the United Kingdom. We ship worldwide Please see our FAQs for terms of sale Thank you for taking the time to visit our shop, any questions, please contact us!
